name: Don't Despair Repair Rice Water Protein + Moisture Strengthening Treatment
categories: Hair, Hair Styling & Treatments, Scalp Treatments
about: What it is:A weekly protein treatment for severely damaged strands thatu2019s scientifically shown to strengthen hair up to 2X after one use..Key Benefits:- Advanced Rice Protein Complex helps strengthen damaged hair cuticles.Highlighted Ingredients:- Rice Protein Complex: Protects hair against damage by strengthening the cuticle with protein..What Else You Need to Know:This 98 percent naturally derived, concentrated strengthening treatment features a dual-action formula that combines strand-fortifying rice protein with ultra-effective moisturizers to help protect and repair severely damaged hair. It is silicone-free, vegan, cruelty-free, and Leaping Bunny certified..Clinical Results:- Scientifically proven to strengthen hair up to 2X after one use
ingredients: -Proprietary Rice-Protein Complex: Protects hair from future damage and strengthens cuticles..-B Vitamins: Improve texture while boosting body and shine..-Algae Extract: Hydrates and strengthens hair while protecting the scalp from free-radical damage...Protein Treatment: .Water/Aqua/Eau, Saccharomyces/Rice Ferment Filtrate, Brassica Alcohol, Squalane, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetyl Alcohol, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Water, Hydrolyzed Rice Protein, Sargassum Filipendula Extract, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Oil, Brassicyl Isoleucinate Esylate, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Capryloyl Glycerin/Sebacic Acid Copolymer, Diheptyl Succinate, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Cetrimonium Chloride, Rosa Canina Fruit Oil, Glycerin, Arginine, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Pentylene Glycol, Citric Acid, Fragrance (Parfum), Dehydroacetic Acid, Benzyl Alcohol, Iron Oxides CI 77491...Moisture Treatment: .Water/Aqua/Eau, Brassica Alcohol, Squalane, Hydrogenated Castor Oil/Sebacic Acid Copolymer, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetyl Alcohol, Sodium PCA, Sargassum Filipendula Extract, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Capryloyl Glycerin/Sebacic Acid Copolymer, Diheptyl Succinate, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Cetrimonium Chloride, Rosa Canina Fruit Oil, Brassicyl Isoleucinate Esylate, Biotin, Panthenol, Glycerin, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Citric Acid, Fragrance (Parfum), Dehydroacetic Acid, Benzyl Alcohol, Iron Oxides CI 77491. ...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:..-After shampooing, wring out hair and apply the treatment evenly throughout damp hair. ..-Leave in for at least 10 minutes or longer/overnight as desired...-Rinse out, then apply Donu2019t Despair, Repair! Deep Conditioning Hair Mask to complete your intensive treatment process. .-For best results, use once a week...-For best results, use 1x a week.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm new to protein masks, but so far I learned my hair loves them. This one is deadly - definitely the most protein I've used in my hair. It leaves my hair incredibly soft but if overused it could lead to brittle hair. I will be using this once a month for safe results. If you find this leaving your hair brittle and hard I'd return because that means your hair doesn't need that much protein! I love Curlsmith's protein treatment and Blueberry Bliss' protein leave-in which are great every day options.  I apply this after shampooing and leave anywhere between 5 to 20 minutes. My hair starts to feel incredibly soft 2 minutes in!! I rinse out and follow with conditioner since I do think none would leave my hair brittle later on. Potent formula!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have to write this review after months with this product. It also makes me really sad to see any hate on it which is guided by misuse and misunderstanding of this oil. This is not a pre wash, scalp, or styling oil. You should not douse your hair in this. Please treat this oil as the amazing healing product it is for your split ends. It truly has made me hair feel vibrantly healthy by only applying a small amount to my ends daily. With any residual I wipe further up the hair to completely prevent the look of frizzy hair. This also works AMAZINGLY in conjunction with their anti-frizz leave in conditioner spray. Overall please give this a try and donu2019t use a lot of product at a time. I recently tried switching to a different highly reviewed hair oil and hated it. Briogeo did not weigh my hair down or feel as fake and refined as some of these others which are made with pure silicones.

reviews.review_text: For reference, I have a ton of fine to medium 2b/c hair that has been chemically treated. This definitely fortifies my hair but leaves it stiff/stringy and a bit dull, verging on greasy. I would never be able to rinse and style this, and it makes my hair unbearably greasy by the second day. I thought I was using too much or not rinsing enough, but when I tried correcting for either it just left my hair dry. This also caused next-day hairstyles to collapse. After using it for a few weeks, I can't say that this caused any improvement in my hair, but it definitely did not leave it in worse condition.

In ONE wash my hair is silky, shiny and looks fantastic!  I got the oil, mask and conditioner.  First off, you'll be impressed by the AMOUNT of product you get. reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is absolutely fabulous!   My hair is processed and never really has a lot of shine.  I applied it, left it on for ten minutes and then followed with the Briogeo repair donu2019t despair hair mask.  Itu2019s a protein treatment that is hydrating as far as protein treatments go, but protein treatments are not hydrating so a follow up mask is needed.    My hair once dried and straightened was sooooo shiny and remained super shiny for four days!   Awesome product.  Beware to those who donu2019t know, protein is great for damaged and porous hair but donu2019t overdo it as too much protein seals the cuticle making it unable to absorb moisture.  I reccomend using products without protein for a few days following this treatment and to use this only once a week as directed.

reviews.review_text: Holy crap Iu2019ve never ACTUALLY had a product that made a difference in my hair after the first use. For reference I have dry, 2C hair that I put a lot of heat on. reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I think most of the negative comments are using the product wrong; this is a protein treatment not a moisture mask! Follow the directions and use a hair mask after. This isnu2019t meant to provide detangling, moisture, or softness. This is meant to add protein to the hair to strengthen and repair protein in the hair. Iu2019ve noticed a huge amount of frizz go away, increased manageability, and shine WHEN USED WITH a mask for moisture. Hair needs a balance of both. Easy to outweigh protein or moisture one way or another, so keep that in mind when using this for sure!

reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product. I bought it the first day they released it based on my love of all Briogeo products Iu2019ve purchased. I have very coarse, dry, naturally curly hair that I straighten/ put heat on regularly. Following a double shampoo I apply this in the shower and let it sit for about 30 min. I follow it with the Donu2019t Despair Repair Deep Conditioning Mask that I let sit for a couple hours. Then to balance out the protein I use the Avocado and Kiwi mega moisture superfood mask for a couple hours. I use this every second wash (alternating with a more moisture/ color care treatment process). My hair feels so amazing after adding this to my routine!!! I canu2019t recommend it enough to anyone whose hair is in need of protein !!!! Buy It !!! You wonu2019t regret it!!!! Really you canu2019t go wrong with any Briogeo product!!
